__TOC__

Born in 1986 in the great country of Norway.

== Contributions ==
** Helped translating Ubuntu to Norwegian Bokmal and Norwegian Nynorsk since Breezy
** Helped lots of people though forums, launchpad, messaging, phone and IRL
** Helped installing and setting up Ubuntu on about 50 computers IRL
** Submitted and contributed to fixing lots of bugs: https://bugs.launchpad.net/~ramvi/
** Founded Ubuntu Eee (http://ubuntu-eee.tuxfamily.org): Ubuntu optimized for the Asus Eee. We help the community, fix bugs and work on moving users over to Ubuntu.
